paragraph.heading: 1Viewing measure details
paragraph.paragraph: It is possible to have some details when evaluating a metric.

list.item: 10_calculating_a_measure.xml Evaluate a metric over a scope.

If the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/60_metric_tool/metric_toolbar.html#details details
40_viewing_measure_details.xml button becomes sensitive, click it to display details.
If not, sorry, no details are available for this measure.

To come back to the main interface click again on
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/60_metric_tool/metric_toolbar.html#hide details details .
